attributes.name: train
attributes.doc: Training sets. These are provided as a dictionary with form ``train[dimension]['labels' or 'inputs'][index]`` and contain 240 labeled vectors for each dimension between 2 and 20.

attributes.name: test
attributes.doc: Test sets. These are provided as a dictionary with form ``test[dimension]['labels' or 'inputs'][index]`` and contain 60 labeled vectors for each dimension between 2 and 20.
